author: ggregory
msg: Refactor to use a var arg method instead of private methods which are now no longer needed and removed.

author: jwross
msg: Support namespaces that allow all capabilities of a bundle.
Certain namespaces might be designed to allow access to all capabilities of a given set of bundles. One such example is the
org.eclipse.equinox.allow.bundle namespace supported by Region Digraph. To support this, an additional check was added when
validating capabilities against the sharing policies. If the first check fails (i.e. matching against namespace and attributes),
a second check is now performed against the bundle revision received from the capability.

author: dkulp
msg: Register the error listener sooner to catch parse errors
